briefTitle: Tamoxifen Dose Adjustment on Indonesian Female ER+ Breast Cancer Patients Based on CYP2D6 Genotype and Endoxifen Levels
officialTitle: Tamoxifen Dose Adjustment on ER+ Breast Cancer Patients Based on Genomic and Metabolite Concentrations Analysis
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Effects of genotype and phenotype of CYP2D6 on plasma and serum concentration of tamoxifen and its metabolites
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Diagnosed with ER+ breast cancer
* Have taken tamoxifen daily for at least 2 months

Exclusion Criteria:

* Have not taken tamoxifen daily for at least 2 months
